Pre-Game Insights: A win for South Africa will guarantee them a place in the final four, while Pakistan need to win to keep their chances of progressing alive.
Pakistan's top-order struggles have been a major issue, while South Africa's problem stops with Temba Bavuma.
Pakistan's attack has been labeled the best in the tournament and could match South Africa pound-for-pound.
Pakistan has had the better of South Africa in T20s recently, winning both the home and away series in 2021.
Tristan Stubbs, a young prodigy, has struggled in the tournament so far, scoring 7 and 6 with only one score above 24.
David Miller, South Africa's most capped T20I player, believes experience is valuable and that the team needs to slow the process down.
Naseem Shah, Pakistan's player, says the team is not dwelling on the defeat to India.
